original_text: The micro-investing app must implement an AI-powered feature (flagged as aiPicksV1) launching 1 June 2025, that surfaces no more than five plain-language, emoji-free stock ideas daily—each passing FINRA “communication with the public” standards and logged in compliance_feed_audit—with the feed accessible exclusively to verified users aged 18–30.
units: The micro - investing app must implement an AI - powered feature ( flagged as aiPicksV1 ) launching 1 June 2025 , that surfaces no more than five plain - language , emoji - free stock ideas daily — each passing FINRA “ communication with the public ” standards and logged in compliance_feed_audit — with the feed accessible exclusively to verified users aged 18–30 .
